apartment.title: The Apartment
about: Calypso Garden Residences is a modern development completed in 2020, close to Rawai Beach and a short drive to Nai Harn.
You can book 1, 2, or 3 identical units for the same dates if availability allows (ideal for families or groups).

items.label: Deposit
items.value: THB 10,000 damage deposit required at check-in (refundable if no damage).

items.label: Electricity
items.value: Electricity usage fee is THB 7 per unit, charged at check-out based on consumption.

items.label: Housekeeping
items.value: Cleaning is included once per week. Extra cleaning is available upon request (charges may apply).

items.q: Can I book more than one unit for the same dates?
items.a: Yes. The booking engine lets you select quantity 1–3 (subject to availability), since the units are identical.

items.q: What are check-in and check-out times?
items.a: Check-in is from 15:00 and check-out is until 11:00.
